Interface Vision2

Interface Vision is a visual object language. It allows developers to program without coding.

School Of Programming

Learning how to program is difficult. Anyone new to programming has to learn how to analyze a problem and how write source code in at least one language: at the same time.

School Of Programming takes a different approach to teaching students how to program. School Of Programming takes advantage of the same technology that Interface Vision uses. This allows us to teach people how to program without teaching them a programming language.

A student is able to focus on analyzing problems and solving problems.
